title: How much filament is required to 3d print a action figure? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are various factors which needs to be considered here like the Dimensions of the Model, Infill of the object, Support material required, etc. Based on all this parameters, the usage of filament can be guesstimated. The best thing to do is load the STL file of your action figure in Cura Slicing Software which is freely available and adjust the model as required in terms of dimensions, infill, support, etc. Cura will display the filament usage in terms of weight as well as length.
FANTASTIC 4 THE THING ACTION FIGURE by MasterclipFor this action figure with standart size, you will need 1 meter of your filament.
